title: Why Your Altcoins Won't Recover (Until This Happens)
transcript:
Crypto has got $275 billion in tokens that 
are going to hit the market by 2030. There is   nowhere near enough demand to absorb it. This

the year before as in 2024 about $800 billion in   buybacks happened then too. The other thing about

Very clearly, demand is greater than supply. And   that's why Bitcoin dominance has gone from 38% in

demand that absorbs the new supply. And this is   where it gets pretty ugly for alts. Alts don't
